name: TVEKAMP
description:
TVEKAMP is a 1v1 duel game where you fight as two viking ships firing arrows at each other. Fight your friends and be the last boat standing, and watch out for the cliffs!

The game was made in 3 days to see how quick I could make a small multiplayer game. To see progress and a timelapse of the viking ship, please see my website

Version 1.0.1
- Fixed the Quit button in the main menu

Thanks to Kevin McLeod for the main theme - Moorland
